results.name: A 5-fractal "castle" starting with 0.
link: B. Cloitre, Graph of a(n) for n=1 up to 25
B. Cloitre, Graph of a(n) for n=1 up to 125
B. Cloitre, Graph of a(n) for n=1 up to 625
formula: a(1) = 0, then a(n) = w(n) - a(n-w(n)) where w(n) = 5^floor(log(n-1)/log(5)).
Conjecture: a(n+1) = (n mod 2) + Sum_{k=0..infinity} (4*5^k*(floor(n/5^(k+1)) mod 2)). - _Charlie Neder_, May 25 2019
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 26 2004
